Uses of Package
main

Packages that use main
Package
Description
main
 
  • Classes in main used by main
    Class
    Description
    AbstractView
    Abstract base class for creating various view components in a graphical user interface that interact with a TablrManager instance.
    CellValue
    Represents a value that can be assigned to a cell.
    Column
    Represents a column in a table structure with a generic value type.
    DesignView
     
    LayoutInfo
    Manages layout configurations for all tables and their associated view types.
    LayoutInfo.TableLayout
    Layout specified for each Table.
    LayoutInfo.ViewLayout
    Layout specific to each view (TablesView, DesignView, RowView, etc.)
    paintListener
    The TablrManagerListener interface defines contentsChanged() that is invoked by the observer.
    RowsView
    RowsView is a view for displaying and interacting with rows in a specific table managed by the TablrManager.
    TablesView
    Represents a view for displaying and interacting with a list of tables.
    TablrManager
    TablrManager is responsible for managing a collection of tables and their corresponding operations.
    ViewList
    Interface representing a list of AbstractViews, providing methods to manage and interact with the views it contains.
    ViewManager
    Manages the set of open AbstractViews in TablrApp
